title: Berberine Supplement for Weight Loss and Blood Sugar Management by Success Chemistry - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Achieve your weight loss goals and maintain healthy blood sugar levels with Success Chemistry's Berberine Supplement. Derived from Berberis Aristata, this powerful plant alkaloid supports metabolism, regulates blood sugar, and promotes healthy weight management.
Key Benefits:
  • Supports Metabolism: Boosts metabolic function, aiding in the breakdown of fats and sugars for effective weight loss.
  • Regulates Blood Sugar: Improves insulin sensitivity, making it beneficial for those with insulin resistance or diabetes.
  • Promotes Weight Management: Helps achieve and maintain weight loss through enhanced metabolism and blood sugar regulation.
  • Improves Insulin Sensitivity: Facilitates effective glucose usage, reducing blood sugar spikes.
  • Supports Heart Health: Contributes to cardiovascular well-being by reducing cholesterol and promoting healthy blood pressure.
Ingredients:
  • Berberis Aristata (bark): A natural source of Berberine with traditional health-promoting properties.
  • Berberine HCl: A concentrated form known for its potency in metabolism and blood sugar regulation.
Why Choose Success Chemistry Berberine Supplement?
  • High-Quality Ingredients: Made from premium Berberis Aristata and Berberine HCl for maximum effectiveness.
  • Supports Overall Health: Benefits heart health in addition to weight loss and blood sugar management.
  • Natural and Safe: Free from artificial additives and preservatives for a natural supplement.
  • Convenient Dosage: Each bottle contains 60 easy-to-swallow capsules for a one-month supply.
Take the next step in achieving your health goals with Success Chemistry's Berberine Supplement, supporting both weight management and overall well-being!
shortDescriptionHtml: Support weight loss and maintain healthy blood sugar levels with Success Chemistry Berberine Supplement. Our formula with Berberis Aristata and Berberine HCl promotes healthy metabolism and insulin sensitivity. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Berberine HCl Blend 1200 mg **
Berberis Aristata (bark), Berberine HCl (Berberis arista) (bark)

**Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Hypromellose (Capsule), Rice Flour, Rice Maltodextrin, Magnesium stearate.
